interim.translation[0].definitions[0].de: intended to be used or accepted for a short time only, until something or someone final can be made or found
interim.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He received an interim payment of £10,000.
interim.translation[2].definitions[0].de: intended to be used or accepted for a short time only, until something final can be made
interim.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Shareholders will receive an interim dividend of £5.03p per share
interim.translation[2].definitions[1].de: prepared after only part of a full financial year has been completed, often after half a year
interim.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: Interim figures announced yesterday show a 16% leap in pre-tax profits to £95 million.
